languages.text: Балансируя между силами, жаждавшими обрести контроль над Вольным Торговцем, {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости удалось пройти по грани между фанатизмом, ересью и обращением в бессердечное чудовище. Всякая сила была для {mf|него|нее} союзником или врагом, но ни одна — хозяином. {name} фон Валанциус служил{mf||а} лишь себе и своей династии, прочие же были для {mf|него|нее} ресурсом или добычей.

Pulled between various forces that were desperate to control the Rogue Trader, {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship managed to walk the fine line between fanaticism, heresy, and becoming a heartless monster. Each force was either an ally or an enemy, but none were {mf|his|her} master. {name} von Valancius served only {mf|him|her}self and {mf|his|her} dynasty. Everything else was either a resource or a trophy.
languages.original_text: Балансируя между силами, жаждавшими обрести контроль над Вольным Торговцем, {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости удалось пройти по грани между фанатизмом, ересью и обращением в бессердечное чудовище. Всякая сила была для {mf|него|нее} союзником или врагом, но ни одна — хозяином. {name} фон Валанциус служил{mf||а} лишь себе и своей династии, прочие же были для {mf|него|нее} ресурсом или добычей.

traits.locale_text: Balancing between the forces that wanted to acquire control over the Rogue Trader, {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship managed to walk on the thin line between fanaticism, heresy and turning into a heartless monster. Each of the forces was to {mf|him|her} an ally or an enemy, but none were {mf|his|her} master. {name} von Vanalcius served only {mf|him|her}self and {mf|his|her} dynasty. As for others — they were either a resource or a trophy.

Balancing between the forces that wanted to acquire control over the Rogue Trader, {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship managed to walk on the thin line between fanaticism, heresy and turning into a heartless monster. Each of the forces was to {mf|him|her} an ally or an enemy, but none were {mf|his|her} master. {name} von Vanalcius served only {mf|him|her}self and {mf|his|her} dynasty. As for others — they were either a resource or a trophy.

Balancing the forces that wanted to control the Rogue Trader, {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship managed to walk the thin line between fanaticism, heresy, and turning into a heartless monster. Each force was either an ally or an enemy, but none were {mf|his|her} master. {name} von Valancius served only {mf|him|her}self and {mf|his|her} dynasty. Everything else was either a resource or a trophy.

Balancing the forces that wanted to control the Rogue Trader, {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship managed to walk the thin line between fanaticism, heresy, and turning into a heartless monster. Each force was either an ally or an enemy, but none were {mf|his|her} master. {name} von Valancius served only {mf|him|her}self and {mf|his|her} dynasty. Everything else was either a resource or a trophy.

Pulled between various forces that were desperate to control the Rogue Trader, {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship managed to walk the fine line between fanaticism, heresy, and becoming a heartless monster. Each force was either an ally or an enemy, but none were {mf|his|her} master. {name} von Valancius served only {mf|him|her}self and {mf|his|her} dynasty. Everything else was either a resource or a trophy.

Pulled between various forces that were desperate to control the Rogue Trader, {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship managed to walk the fine line between fanaticism, heresy, and becoming a heartless monster. Each force was either an ally or an enemy, but none were {mf|his|her} master. {name} von Valancius served only {mf|him|her}self and {mf|his|her} dynasty. Everything else was either a resource or a trophy.

languages.text: 行商浪人在狂热之人、异端分子与无情怪物这三个角色间不断游走，成功制衡了渴望控制{mf|他的|她的}诸多势力。在{mf|他的|她的}眼里，所有其他势力要么是{mf|他的|她的}盟友，要么是敌人，但绝不可能成为{mf|他的|她的}主人。{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯只为{mf|他|她}自己与{mf|他|她}的王朝服务，而其他的一切，都不过是可以利用的资源或战利品。
languages.original_text: Pulled between various forces that were desperate to control the Rogue Trader, {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship managed to walk the fine line between fanaticism, heresy, and becoming a heartless monster. Each force was either an ally or an enemy, but none were {mf|his|her} master. {name} von Valancius served only {mf|him|her}self and {mf|his|her} dynasty. Everything else was either a resource or a trophy.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人在狂热之人、异端分子与无情怪物这三个角色间不断游走，成功制衡了想要控制{mf|他的|她的}诸多势力。在{mf|他的|她的}眼里，所有其他势力要么是{mf|他的|她的}盟友，要么是敌人，但绝不可能成为{mf|他的|她的}主人。{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯只为{mf|他|她}自己与{mf|他|她}的王朝服务，而其他的一切，都不过是可以利用的资源或战利品。

languages.text: Verschiedene Mächte zerrten an {mf|Seiner Lordschaft|Ihrer Ladyschaft} und trachteten danach, die {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu kontrollieren — doch es gelang {mf|ihm|ihr}, den schmalen Grat zwischen Fanatismus, Ketzerei und der Verwandlung in ein herzloses Monster zu wandeln. Jede Macht war entweder ein Verbündeter oder ein Feind, doch keine war {mf|sein|ihr} Meister. {name} von Valancius diente nur sich selbst und {mf|seiner|ihrer} Dynastie. Alles andere war entweder eine Ressource oder eine Trophäe.
languages.original_text: Pulled between various forces that were desperate to control the Rogue Trader, {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship managed to walk the fine line between fanaticism, heresy, and becoming a heartless monster. Each force was either an ally or an enemy, but none were {mf|his|her} master. {name} von Valancius served only {mf|him|her}self and {mf|his|her} dynasty. Everything else was either a resource or a trophy.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} stand vor der Herausforderung, die Mächte zu balancieren, die Kontrolle über {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ausüben wollten — und es gelang {mf|ihm|ihr}, den schmalen Grat zwischen Fanatismus, Ketzerei und der Verwandlung in ein herzloses Monster zu wandeln. Jede Macht war entweder ein Verbündeter oder ein Feind, doch keine war {mf|sein|ihr} Meister. {name} von Valancius diente nur sich selbst und {mf|seiner|ihrer} Dynastie. Alles andere war entweder eine Ressource oder eine Trophäe.

languages.text: Jonglant entre les différentes forces qui cherchaient désespérément à {mf|le|la} contrôler, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} réussit à évoluer à la limite du fanatisme, de l'hérésie et de la transformation en monstre impitoyable. Chaque force était soit une alliée, soit une ennemie, mais aucune ne parvint à se rendre maître {mf|de lui|d'elle}. {name} von Valancius ne servit ainsi que ses propres intérêts et ceux de sa dynastie. Tout le reste n'était à ses yeux que ressources ou trophées.
languages.original_text: Pulled between various forces that were desperate to control the Rogue Trader, {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship managed to walk the fine line between fanaticism, heresy, and becoming a heartless monster. Each force was either an ally or an enemy, but none were {mf|his|her} master. {name} von Valancius served only {mf|him|her}self and {mf|his|her} dynasty. Everything else was either a resource or a trophy.

traits.locale_text: Jonglant entre les forces qui cherchaient à {mf|le|la} contrôler, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} réussit à évoluer à la limite du fanatisme, de l'hérésie et de la transformation en monstre impitoyable. Chaque force était soit une alliée, soit une ennemie, mais aucune ne parvint à se rendre maître {mf|de lui|d'elle}. {name} von Valancius ne servit ainsi que ses propres intérêts et ceux de sa dynastie. Tout le reste n’était à ses yeux que ressources ou trophées.

languages.text: Empujad{mf|o|a} por todas las fuerzas que pretendían desesperadamente controlar{mf|le|la}, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente consiguió posicionarse entre la devoción fanática, la herejía y convertirse en un monstruo desalmado. Todas eran aliadas o enemigas, pero ninguna era su dueña y señora. {name} von Valancius solo sirvió a sus propósitos y a los de su dinastía. Todo lo demás eran recursos y trofeos.
languages.original_text: Pulled between various forces that were desperate to control the Rogue Trader, {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship managed to walk the fine line between fanaticism, heresy, and becoming a heartless monster. Each force was either an ally or an enemy, but none were {mf|his|her} master. {name} von Valancius served only {mf|him|her}self and {mf|his|her} dynasty. Everything else was either a resource or a trophy.

traits.locale_text: Manteniendo un perfecto equilibrio entre todas las fuerzas que pretendían controlar{mf|le|la}, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente consiguió posicionarse entre la devoción fanática, la herejía y convertirse en un monstruo desalmado. Todas eran aliadas o enemigas, pero ninguna era su dueña y señora. {name} von Valancius solo sirvió a sus propósitos y a los de su dinastía. Todo lo demás eran recursos y trofeos.

languages.text: 自由開拓者は自らを操ろうとする勢力の間で板挟みになりつつも、その統治は紙一重で狂信にも異端信仰にも、怪物じみた冷血さにも陥ることがなかった。諸勢力は敵にも味方にもなりえたが、{mf|彼|彼女}が彼らに仕えることはなかった。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスの主は己と王朝だけ。それ以外のすべては資源か戦利品に過ぎなかったのだ。
languages.original_text: Pulled between various forces that were desperate to control the Rogue Trader, {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship managed to walk the fine line between fanaticism, heresy, and becoming a heartless monster. Each force was either an ally or an enemy, but none were {mf|his|her} master. {name} von Valancius served only {mf|him|her}self and {mf|his|her} dynasty. Everything else was either a resource or a trophy.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者は自らを操ろうとする勢力の間で板挟みになりつつも、その統治は紙一重で狂信にも異端信仰にも、怪物じみた冷血さにも陥ることがなかった。諸勢力は敵にも味方にもなりえたが、{mf|彼|彼女}が彼らに仕えることはなかった。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスの主は己と王朝だけ。それ以外のすべては資源か戦利品に過ぎなかったのだ。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'i kontrolü altına almak için canla başla çalışan çeşitli güçlerin arasında kalan {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri; fanatik, kâfir ve kalpsiz bir canavar olmak arasındaki ince çizgide başarıyla yürüdü. Karşısına çıkan her güç ya bir müttefiki ya da bir düşmanı olsa da hiçbiri ama hiçbiri onun efendisi olamadı. {name} von Valancius, yalnızca kendisine ve kendi hanedanlığına hizmet etti. Kalan her şey ya bir kaynaktı ya da savaş ganimetiydi.
languages.original_text: Pulled between various forces that were desperate to control the Rogue Trader, {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship managed to walk the fine line between fanaticism, heresy, and becoming a heartless monster. Each force was either an ally or an enemy, but none were {mf|his|her} master. {name} von Valancius served only {mf|him|her}self and {mf|his|her} dynasty. Everything else was either a resource or a trophy.

traits.locale_text: Bir Hür Tacir'i kontrolü altına almak için canla başla çalışan çeşitli güçlerin arasında kalan {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri; fanatik, kâfir ve kalpsiz bir canavar olmak arasındaki ince çizgide yürümeyi başardı. Karşısına çıkan her güç ya bir müttefikti ya da bir düşmandı ancak hiçbiri ama hiçbiri onun efendisi değildi. {name} von Valancius yalnızca kendisine ve kendi hanedanlığına hizmet etti. Geriye kalan her şey ya bir kaynaktı ya da bir savaş ganimetiydi.
